changelog:
If you encounter any issues or have suggestions, please post about them in github issues or in our discord server


Main changes:
- Search redesign
- App lock
- Another video player backend option
- Ability to retry failed downloads
- Fixes for Sankaku and other boorus

-------------------

New features:
- Search redesign
 > Tab and booru selectors are now combined
 > Metatags syntax support for danbooru, gelbooru and sankaku with links to detailed descriptions
 > Many of the actions can be long-tapped for additional actions, experiment with them! (FYI: This applies to other places in the app too!)
 > Related settings - [Interface->Show search bar in preview grid, Search view quick actions panel, Search view input autofocus]

- Ability to lock the app with biometrics/PIN [Privacy->App lock]
 > Adds a button to main drawer to manually lock the app
 > Otherwise it will lock after 2 minutes (by default) if the app is in background [Can be changed or disabled in Privacy->Auto lock after]

- Added a setting to blur app content when it's not in foreground [Privacy->Blur screen when leaving the app]
- New video backend option - MDK
- Added an option to change search starting page from

dialog [Long tap on add tab button]
- Random sorting in favourites/downloads (sort:random)
- You can now retry failed/existing/cancelled items in Snatcher drawer
- Added option to sync snatched items to lolisync
- Added a setting to fast forward videos at 2x-4x speed when you hold down the finger [Video->Long tap to fast forward video]. Experimental for now, may become default behaviour in the future update. Any feedback would be appreciated


Changes:
- Upgraded Flutter and all dependencies to latest versions
- Added an option to manually set item as snatched when you long tap the Snatch button in viewer
- Added a favicon preview when adding/editing a booru config
- Show item thumbnail on notification when you add a single item to snatcher queue
- Filter snatcher results using tag filters
- Redesigned video speed dialog and added more options


Booru changes/fixes:
- Fixed Sankaku 403 error if config used old url
- Added support for R34US (limited, requires data update before vieweing the content/favouriting/viewing tags info/filtering)
- Restored support for R34 xyz/world/valut, but in a limited capacity (requires data update before favouriting/viewing tags info/filtering)
- Fixed e6ai not being possible to add due to a data parsing error


Fixes:
- App theme now should properly update when system theme changes
- Fixed batch removal of tabs (tabs removed in wrong positions)
- Disabled mouse wheel scrolling zoom on mobile


and other small fixes and changes...
